title: Using Output and Text Variables
description:
Choose and edit the correct block from the tray so that when the program runs it displays the values of the first and last name variables.

The output should be the following:

Rowan
Smith
hint:
Drop two output blocks at the end of the existing program. Then replace "words" in the first output block so that the code will output the value of the firstName variable. The second output block should then be edited so it outputs the value of the lastName variable.

The output block is able to display text, only. So you may directly type in the text by surrounding the words with quotes or in this case use a variable with a text type (e.g. output firstName).
